trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell 指令程式

trans-unit.source: Compress-Archive
trans-unit.target: Compress-Archive

trans-unit.source: Compress-Archive
trans-unit.target: Compress-Archive

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 概要

trans-unit.source: Creates an archive, or zipped file, from specified files and folders.
trans-unit.target: 建立封存檔或 zip 壓縮的檔，從指定的檔案和資料夾。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 語法

trans-unit.source: Path (Default)
trans-unit.target: 路徑 （預設值）

trans-unit.source: PathWithUpdate
trans-unit.target: PathWithUpdate

trans-unit.source: PathWithForce
trans-unit.target: PathWithForce

trans-unit.source: LiteralPathWithUpdate
trans-unit.target: LiteralPathWithUpdate

trans-unit.source: LiteralPathWithForce
trans-unit.target: LiteralPathWithForce

trans-unit.source: LiteralPath
trans-unit.target: 常值路徑

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The **Compress-Archive** cmdlet creates a zipped (or compressed) archive file from one or more specified files or folders.
trans-unit.target: **壓縮封存** 指令程式會建立壓縮的 （或壓縮） 封存檔案，從一個或多個指定的檔案或資料夾。

trans-unit.source: An archive file allows multiple files to be packaged, and optionally compressed, into a single zipped file for easier distribution and storage.
trans-unit.target: 封存檔案可讓多個封裝，並選擇性地壓縮成單一的壓縮檔，更容易散發和儲存體檔案。

trans-unit.source: An archive file can be compressed by using the compression algorithm specified by the CompressionLevel parameter.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用 CompressionLevel 參數所指定的壓縮演算法來壓縮的封存檔案。

trans-unit.source: Because **Compress-Archive** relies upon the Microsoft .NET Framework API **System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive** to compress files, the maximum file size that you can compress by using **Compress-Archive** is currently 2 GB.
trans-unit.target: 因為 **壓縮封存** 依賴 Microsoft.NET Framework API **System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive** 壓縮檔案，您可以使用壓縮的最大檔案大小 **壓縮封存** 目前是 2 GB。

trans-unit.source: This is a limitation of the underlying API.
trans-unit.target: 這是基礎 API 的限制。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 範例

trans-unit.source: Example 1: Create an archive file
trans-unit.target: 範例 1︰ 建立保存檔案

trans-unit.source: This command creates a new archive file, Draft.zip, by compressing two files, Draftdoc.docx and diagram2.vsd, specified by the *LiteralPath* parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個命令會建立新的封存檔案，Draft.zip，Draftdoc.docx 和 diagram2.vsd，所指定的兩個檔案壓縮 *LiteralPath* 參數。

trans-unit.source: The compression level specified for this operation is Optimal.
trans-unit.target: 指定給此作業的壓縮層級是最佳。

trans-unit.source: Example 2: Create an archive with wildcard characters
trans-unit.target: 範例 2︰ 建立封存檔包含萬用字元

trans-unit.source: This command creates a new archive file, Draft.zip, in the C:\Archives folder.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會建立新的封存檔案，Draft.zip，C:\Archives 資料夾中。

trans-unit.source: Note that though the file name extension .zip was not added to the value of the *DestinationPath* parameter, Windows PowerShell appends this to the specified archive file name automatically.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，雖然檔案名稱副檔名.zip 未新增至值 *DestinationPath* 參數時，Windows PowerShell 附加至指定的封存檔案名稱自動。

trans-unit.source: The new archive file contains every file in the C:\Reference folder, because a wildcard character was used in place of specific file names in the *Path* parameter.
trans-unit.target: 新的封存檔案包含在 C:\Reference 資料夾中，每個檔案，因為已取代特定的檔案名稱中使用萬用字元 *路徑* 參數。

trans-unit.source: The specified compression level is Fastest, which might result in a larger output file, but compresses a large number of files faster.
trans-unit.target: 指定的壓縮等級是最快，這可能會導致較大的輸出檔案，但速度會壓縮大量的檔案。

trans-unit.source: Example 3: Update an existing archive file
trans-unit.target: 範例 3︰ 更新現有的封存檔案

trans-unit.source: This command updates an existing archive file, Draft.Zip, in the C:\Archives folder.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會更新現有的封存檔案，Draft.Zip，C:\Archives 資料夾中。

trans-unit.source: The command is run to update Draft.Zip with newer versions of existing files that came from the C:\Reference folder, and also to add new files that have been added to C:\Reference since Draft.Zip was initially created.
trans-unit.target: 更新 Draft.Zip 隨附 C:\Reference 資料夾中的現有檔案的較新版本，同時加入 Draft.Zip 一開始建立以來已加入至 C:\Reference 的新檔案，將執行的命令。

trans-unit.source: Example 4: Create an archive from an entire folder
trans-unit.target: 範例 4︰ 建立封存檔從整個資料夾

trans-unit.source: This command creates an archive from an entire folder, C:\Reference.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會從整個資料夾，C:\Reference 建立封存檔。

trans-unit.source: Note that though the file name extension .zip was not added to the value of the *DestinationPath* parameter, Windows PowerShell appends this to the specified archive file name automatically.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，雖然檔案名稱副檔名.zip 未新增至值 *DestinationPath* 參數時，Windows PowerShell 附加至指定的封存檔案名稱自動。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 參數

trans-unit.source: -CompressionLevel
trans-unit.target: -CompressionLevel

trans-unit.source: Specifies how much compression to apply when you are creating the archive file.
trans-unit.target: 指定當您正在建立保存檔案時要套用的壓縮程度。

trans-unit.source: Faster compression requires less time to create the file, but can result in larger file sizes.
trans-unit.target: 壓縮更快需要較少的時間來建立檔案，但可能會導致較大檔案大小。

trans-unit.source: The acceptable values for this parameter are:
trans-unit.target: 此參數接受的值包括：

trans-unit.source: Fastest.
trans-unit.target: 最快。

trans-unit.source: Use the fastest compression method available to decrease processing time; this can result in larger file sizes.
trans-unit.target: 使用最快的壓縮方法可用來減少處理時間。這會導致較大檔案大小。

trans-unit.source: NoCompression.
trans-unit.target: NoCompression。

trans-unit.source: Do not compress the source files.
trans-unit.target: 不壓縮的原始程式檔。

trans-unit.source: Optimal.
trans-unit.target: 最佳化。

trans-unit.source: Processing time is dependent on file size.
trans-unit.target: 處理時間會視檔案大小。

trans-unit.source: If this parameter is not specified, the command uses the default value, Optimal.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定此參數，命令會使用預設的最佳值。

trans-unit.source: -Confirm
trans-unit.target: -Confirm

trans-unit.source: Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 會提示您進行確認，然後再執行此指令程式。會提示您進行確認，然後再執行此指令程式。

trans-unit.source: -DestinationPath
trans-unit.target: -DestinationPath

trans-unit.source: Specifies the path to the archive output file.
trans-unit.target: 指定的封存輸出檔案的路徑。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is required.
trans-unit.target: 此為必要參數。

trans-unit.source: The specified *DestinationPath* value should include the desired name of the output zipped file; it specifies either the absolute or relative path to the zipped file.
trans-unit.target: 指定 *DestinationPath* 值應該包含想要的輸出的 zip 檔案的名稱; 它會指定壓縮檔案絕對或相對路徑。

trans-unit.source: If the file name specified in *DestinationPath* does not have a .zip file name extension, the cmdlet adds a .zip file name extension.
trans-unit.target: 如果在指定的檔名 *DestinationPath* 沒有.zip 副檔名，cmdlet 會將.zip 副檔名。

trans-unit.source: -Force
trans-unit.target: -Force

trans-unit.source: {{Fill Force Description}}
trans-unit.target: {{填滿強制描述}}

trans-unit.source: -LiteralPath
trans-unit.target: -LiteralPath

trans-unit.source: Specifies the path or paths to the files that you want to add to the archive zipped file.
trans-unit.target: 指定您想要新增封存壓縮檔案的檔案的路徑。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the *Path* parameter, the value of *LiteralPath* is used exactly as it is typed.
trans-unit.target: 不同於 *路徑* 參數、 值 *LiteralPath* 完全依照其輸入使用。

trans-unit.source: No characters are interpreted as wildcards.
trans-unit.target: 沒有字元會被視為萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: If the path includes escape characters, enclose each escape character in single quotation marks, to instruct Windows PowerShell not to interpret any characters as escape sequences.
trans-unit.target: 如果路徑包含逸出字元，請使用單引號，以指示 Windows PowerShell 不要將任何字元視為逸出序列括住每個逸出字元。

trans-unit.source: To specify multiple paths, and include files in multiple locations in your output zipped file, use commas to separate the paths.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定多個路徑，並將檔案納入輸出 zip 檔案中的多個位置，使用逗號來分隔路徑。

trans-unit.source: -Path
trans-unit.target: -Path

trans-unit.source: Specifies the path or paths to the files that you want to add to the archive zipped file.
trans-unit.target: 指定您想要新增封存壓縮檔案的檔案的路徑。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can accept wildcard characters.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數可以接受萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: Wildcard characters allow you to add all files in a folder to your zipped archive file.
trans-unit.target: 萬用字元可讓您將所有檔案的資料夾中都新增至壓縮的封存檔案。

trans-unit.source: To specify multiple paths, and include files in multiple locations in your output zipped file, use commas to separate the paths.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定多個路徑，並將檔案納入輸出 zip 檔案中的多個位置，使用逗號來分隔路徑。

trans-unit.source: -Update
trans-unit.target: 更新

trans-unit.source: Updates the specified archive by replacing older versions of files in the archive with newer versions of files that have the same names.
trans-unit.target: 以具有相同名稱的檔案較新版本取代舊版的封存中的檔案會更新指定的封存。

trans-unit.source: You can also add this parameter to add files to an existing archive.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以加入此參數，以將檔案新增至現有的封存。

trans-unit.source: -WhatIf
trans-unit.target: -WhatIf

trans-unit.source: Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 顯示執行 Cmdlet 後會發生的情況。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 無法執行此指令程式。顯示執行此指令程式會發生什麼事。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.
trans-unit.target: 未執行 Cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 這個 cmdlet 支援一般參數:-偵錯、-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 以及-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸入

trans-unit.source: System.String
trans-unit.target: System.String

trans-unit.source: You can pipe a string that contains a path to one or more files.
trans-unit.target: 您可以透過管道傳送字串，包含一或多個檔案的路徑。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸出

trans-unit.source: System.IO.FileInfo
trans-unit.target: System.IO.FileInfo

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 附註

trans-unit.source: RELATED LINKS
trans-unit.target: 相關的連結

trans-unit.target: Expand-Archive
